몬스터(동물)

MONSTERS (ANIMALS)

This section provides statistics and basic information for many common kinds of mundane animals. These creatures generally operate on instinct, driven by simple needs such as food and reproduction. Most animals, even predators, do not 공격 unless they or their young are threatened.

Animals are not capable of detailed reasoning, although with 동물 조련 skill it is possible to tame an animal and teach it to 공연 certain tricks.

Some herbivorous animals do not normally use their natural 무기 to 공격. As such, their natural 무기 are treated as secondary 공격. The animal’s 공격 and 피해 entries note this fact, with an explanatory footnote.

Animal Traits: An animal possesses the following traits (unless otherwise noted in a creature’s entry).

—지능 score of 1 or 2 (no creature with an 지능 score of 3 or higher can be an animal).

—저광시야.

—성향: Always neutral. Animals are not governed by a human sense of morality.

—전리품: None. Animals never possess 전리품.

These herd animals can be aggressive when protecting young and during the mating season, but they generally prefer flight to fighting. A 들소 stands more than 6 feet tall at the shoulder and is 9 to 12 feet long. It weigh 1,800 to 2,400 pounds. 들소’s statistics can be used for almost any large herd animal.

전투

Combat

Stampede (Ex): A frightened herd of 들소 flees as a group in a random direction (but always away from the perceived source of danger). They literally 달리기 over anything of Large size or smaller that gets in their way, dealing 1d12 points of 피해 for each five 들소 in the herd (Reflex DC 18 half ). The save DC is 근력-based.

낙타 are known for their ability to travel long distances without food or water.

The statistics presented here are for the dromedary, or one-humped 낙타, which thrives in warm deserts. A dromedary stands about 7 feet tall at the shoulder, with its hump rising 1 foot higher. The two-humped, or Bactrian, 낙타 is suited to cooler, rocky 범위. It is stockier, slower (속도 40 feet), and has a higher 건강 score (16).

운반 수용량: A 빛 load for a 낙타 is up to 300 pounds; a medium load, 301–600 pounds; and a heavy load, 601–900 pounds. A 낙타 can drag 4,500 pounds.

*A 낙타’s bite is treated as a secondary 공격 and adds only half 낙타’s 근력 보너스 to 피해 roll.

악어 are aggressive predators 11 to 12 feet long. They lie mostly submerged in rivers or marshes, with only their eyes and nostrils showing, waiting for prey to come within reach.

전투

Combat

Improved Grab (Ex): To use this ability, a 악어 must hit with its bite 공격. It can then attempt to start a 드잡이 as a free action without provoking an 공격 of opportunity. If it wins 드잡이 check, 악어 establishes a hold on the opponent with its mouth and drags it into deep water, attempting to pin it to the bottom.

Hold Breath (Ex): A 악어 can hold its breath for a number of rounds equal to 4 x its 건강 score before it risks 숨참기.

스킬: A 악어 has a +8 racial 보너스 on any 수영 check to 공연 some special action or avoid a hazard. It can always choose to take 10 on a 수영 check, even if distracted or endangered.
